numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I believe that young men do not contact their parents as much as other people.
2. Some stereotypes say that a male figure can do things by himself.
3. Some stereotypes say that a male figure is strong.
4. Some stereotypes say that a male figure does not need help from anyone.
5. Some stereotypes say that a male figure does not need help from his parents.
6. Some stereotypes say that a female figure is responsible for taking care of the parents.
8. I will contact my parents often.
9. I will see my parents often.
